attributes.action: ensure that not one penny of UK Government aid goes into the hands of the Government of Sudan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following recent publicity it has become apparent that the UK taxpayer is providing almost one third of international funding to this country. 

In light of the Sudanese Governments backing of atrocities in Darfur we should have an undertaking from our Government that not one penny of funding will go directly into the control of the Sudanese Government.

NB This petition does NOT cover private investment nor does it preclude the provision of aid through recognised agencies to be administered for humanitarian reasons
